sentences.english: The approval letter issued by Lands Department for construction of village house in south Lantau.

sentences.english: At present, Sino-Japanese economic ties are not heating up along with cold political ties.
sentences.chinese: 當今中日關係的現狀是“政溫經不熱”。

sentences.english: Suspicion towards Mr Tsang remains strong in business and political quarters, particularly in the pro-Beijing camp.
sentences.chinese: 政商界對曾蔭權並不信任，尤其是左派。

sentences.english: Governing by virtue" is the traditional mainstream political concepts."

sentences.english: All the information in this form shall be correct so that Michael could arrange all the work in the right time.
sentences.chinese: 表中的各項信息必須準確，以利於黃政安排各項工作。

sentences.english: To help save administrative costs, please do not send me a donation receipt.

sentences.english: Lady Wang, Jia Zheng's wife first gave birth to a son, named Jia Zhu.
